author: senh
title: Gerry Frank's picks: Pacific City is home to Oregon's only oceanfront brewery, Pelican Pub & Brewery
text: BING NEWS: Gerry Frank's picks: Pacific City is home to Oregon's only oceanfront brewery, Pelican Pub & Brewery The award-winning Pelican Pub & Brewery (33180 Cape Kiwanda Drive, Pacific City; 503-965-7007; pelicanbrewery.com) is Oregon's only oceanfront brewery, with the bonus of front-and-center views of Haystack Rock. As if that wasn't enticing enough, they serve ...
